member.name: P:UserProgressBar.ProgressBar.FixedTitle
member.summary: True, if form title is fixed and false, if it is variable.

member.name: P:UserProgressBar.ProgressBar.frmTitle
member.summary: Sets the title of the form.If frmTitle is null then title bar of form is invisible.

member.name: P:UserProgressBar.ProgressBar.Size
member.summary: Sets the size of the form.

member.summary: Sets the location of the form.

member.name: P:UserProgressBar.ProgressBar.Value
member.summary: Sets the location of the form.

member.name: P:UserProgressBar.ProgressBar.lblBkColor
member.summary: Sets the backcolor of the labels.

member.name: P:UserProgressBar.ProgressBar.lblForeColor
member.summary: Sets the forecolor of the labels.

member.name: P:UserProgressBar.ProgressBar.BtnText
